data.title: Thomas Siebel
data.meta_description: #809 Thomas Siebel on the 2024 Billionaires - Tom Siebel built software firm Siebel Systems and sold it to Oracle in 2006 for $5.8 billion in cash and
data.text:

Game Changers: Sprinting For Gold At The 2024 Olympic Games With Gabby Thomas

Gabby Thomas, the second-fastest 200-meter sprinter in US history, is poised for gold at the upcoming Olympics. With two medals from the Tokyo Games already to her name, she?s on a clear path toward sports superstardom. But Thomas? vision extends beyond Olympic glory, and she has even bigger ambitions: to bring more visibility to female track and field athletes. ForbesWomen editor Maggie McGrath talks to Gabby about her wide-ranging career from inspiring young female athletes to partnering with Alexis Ohanian on a first-of-its-kind track & field event, and how she is breaking barriers and attracting unprecedented viewership and investment to her sport.

Members-Only Event: Game Changers: Sprinting For Gold At The 2024 Olympic Games With Gabby Thomas

Join ForbesWomen editor Maggie McGrath July 25th for an exclusive webcast, Game Changers: Sprinting For Gold At The 2024 Olympic Games With Gabby Thomas. Tune in to hear how this world champion and Olympic hopeful maintains peak performance while championing female athletes both on and off the track.
